properties.description: creating a view of personnel area for PBI reports

source:
from notebookutils import mssparkutils
storage_account=mssparkutils.notebook.run('/utils/py_utils_get_storage_account')

is_dev_or_test_env = 'dev' in storage_account or 'test' in storage_account
max_limit = 20 if is_dev_or_test_env else 100000000

spark.sql(f"SET MAX_LIMIT = {max_limit}")

%%sql

CREATE OR REPLACE VIEW odw_curated_db.vw_service_user

AS

SELECT DISTINCT

    SU.SUAreaID                             AS ID,
    SU.Salutation                           AS salutation,
    SU.FirstName                            AS firstName,
    SU.LastName                             AS lastName,
    SU.AddressLine1                         AS addressLine1,
    SU.AddressLine2                         AS addressLine2,
    SU.AddressTown                          AS addressTown,
    SU.AddressCounty                        AS addressCounty,
    SU.Postcode                             AS postcode,
    "United Kingdom"                        AS addressCountry,
    SU.Organisation                         AS organisation,
    SU.OrganisationType                     AS organisationType,
    SU.Role                                 AS role,
    SU.TelephoneNumber                      AS telephoneNumber,
    SU.OtherPhoneNumber                     AS otherPhoneNumber,
    SU.FaxNumber                            AS faxNumber,
    SU.EmailAddress                         AS emailAddress,
    SU."webAddress"                         AS webAddress,
    SU.ServiceUserType                      AS serviceUserType,
    SU.CaseReference                        AS caseReference,
    SU.IngestionDate                        AS ingestionDate,
    "back-office-applications"              AS sourceSystem,
    SU.TicketID                             AS sourceSuid
    
FROM odw_harmonised_db.service_user_dim     AS SU
WHERE SU.IsActive = 'Y'
ORDER BY ingestionDate DESC


LIMIT ${MAX_LIMIT}

%%sql
CREATE OR REPLACE TABLE odw_curated_db.service_user
USING delta
AS
SELECT 
    ID,
    SourceSystemID,
    salutation,
    firstName,
    lastName,
    emailAddress,
    telephoneNumber,
    otherPhoneNumber,
    faxNumber,
    addressLine1,
    addressLine2,
    addressTown,
    addressCounty,
    postcode,
    organisation,
    organisationType,
    serviceUserType,
    caseReference,
    sourceSystem
    
FROM odw_curated_db.vw_service_user

if is_dev_or_test_env:

    import pandas as pd
    from faker import Faker
    
    df = spark.sql("select * from odw_curated_db.service_user").toPandas()

    if(len(df) > 0):
        fake = Faker()
        
        df['firstName'] = [fake.first_name() for _ in range(len(df))]
        df['lastName'] = [fake.last_name() for _ in range(len(df))]
        df['emailAddress'] = [fake.email() for _ in range(len(df))]
        df['telephoneNumber'] = [fake.phone_number() for _ in range(len(df))]
        df['otherPhoneNumber'] = [fake.phone_number() for _ in range(len(df))]
        df['faxNumber'] = [fake.phone_number() for _ in range(len(df))]
        
        df = spark.createDataFrame(df)

        table_loc = "abfss://odw-curated@"+storage_account+'service_user'
        df.write.format("delta").mode("overwrite").save(table_loc)
